Bayesian superyacht shipwreck: Italian prosecutors confirm manslaughter investigation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bayesian-superyacht-shipwreck-italian-prosecutors-announce-manslaughter-investigation/DZ6C25C4SBAEDCTNLOEESTAGUE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/bayesian-superyacht-shipwreck-italian-prosecutors-announce-manslaughter-investigation/DZ6C25C4SBAEDCTNLOEESTAGUE/ It comes after the body of the daughter of tech billionaire Mick Lynch was recovered. Sat, 24 Aug 2024 09:14:18 +0000 Italian officials have announced a manslaughter investigation into the sinking of super yacht Bayesian off the Sicilian coast.
Traffic in Auckland CBD slows to crawl, Victoria St carpark clogged for hours https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/traffic-in-auckland-cbd-slows-to-crawl-victoria-st-car-park-clogged-for-hours/KYY32ZEBFZDEDP7O2P5QX7O5CQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/traffic-in-auckland-cbd-slows-to-crawl-victoria-st-car-park-clogged-for-hours/KYY32ZEBFZDEDP7O2P5QX7O5CQ/ One person said he only moved 50m in half an hour.
